title: Microsoft.Data.Sqlite
description: Lightweight ADO.NET provider for SQLite databases. Implements standard ADO.NET abstractions (`SqliteConnection`, `SqliteCommand`, `SqliteDataReader`) for embedded database access. Supports connection strings, parameters, transactions, async operations, encryption, blob I/O, and user-defined functions. Entity Framework Core's SQLite provider is built on this library.
shortDescription: ADO.NET provider for embedded SQLite database access.
